name: World War II Sniper: Call to Victory
name_original: World War II Sniper: Call to Victory
description:
World War II Sniper: Call to Victory is an action-shooter game developed by Jarhead Games. It was originally released in 2004. Groove Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
World War II Sniper: Call to Victory is available on PC.
